title: Morty and the Walkathon
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,031 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 640L, Fiction Series
description: Do you enjoy working with a partner? Some love it, but for others, it can be a challenge. In Morty and the Walkathon, Morty discovers the benefits of teamwork while working toward an important goal. Readers will relate to the problems the characters face in this story and learn a valuable lesson along the way. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters as well as to use quotation marks correctly.
